name: censys
label: Censys
description: This connector allows for information to be pulled from the Censys search engine

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: URL of the Censys API server to which you will connect and perform the automated operation
fields.name: url

fields.title: Customer Key
fields.description: Secret key to access the Censys API.
fields.name: customerKey

parameters.title: Certificate
parameters.name: sha256_cert
parameters.description: SHA256 Certificate which you want to search and retrieve information.
parameters.tooltip: SHA256 Certificate about which information is needed

parameters.title: Domain
parameters.decription: Domain which you want to seatch and retrieve information.
parameters.name: domain
parameters.tooltip: Domain about which information is needed

operations.title: Lookup IP Address
operations.description: Lookup an IP Address on Censys

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.description: IP Address which you want to search and retrieve information.
parameters.name: ipaddr
parameters.tooltip: IP address to fetch information about
